name: TalkMerchant
_source: speak;Priest;To use magic for such purposes...{w}{br}Gah! It boils my blood.{w}{br}Please be careful around those men.{w}{br}They draw their power from a strange obelisk to the east.{w}{br}They've also seized a fort nearby.
speak;Simon;We aren't afraid.{w} We beat them here,{w}{br}and we'll rout them again.
speak;Priest;The bandits they sent here were their weakest, I'm afraid.{w}{br}You musn't underestimate Vilge and his lot.
